Package pingPongGame.view

Class MainView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
pingPongGame.view.MainView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class MainView extends javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
The main view of the Ping Pong Game application, managing the display of different game views.
Since:
2024-03-09
